tables.title: Roadside Events
tables.description: Situational events to drop on the road between destinations.

entries.result: Abandoned cart with fresh tracks leading into the underbrush.
A wounded messenger collapses, clutching a sealed scroll.
Weather turns suddenly: sleet and harsh wind slow the party.
A caravan requests an escort through a rumored bandit stretch.
Travelers share rumors about a cursed milestone up ahead.
A patrol demands proof of travel rights and searches for contraband.
A collapsed bridge forces a detour across precarious stepping stones.
An injured giant boar charges wildly across the road.

tables.title: Urban Complications
tables.description: Twists that complicate city downtime or errands.

entries.result: A pickpocket succeeds; the stolen purse contains a mysterious key.
A street preacher denounces the party, drawing a curious crowd.
Guild enforcers mistake the party for debtors and demand payment.
Someone swaps packages—opening it reveals volatile alchemical vials.
A sudden curfew shutters shops; only back-alley dealers remain.
A noble’s retainer offers work, but insists on secrecy and speed.
Two rival factions fight openly in the street, endangering bystanders.

tables.title: Mysterious Missives
tables.description: Letters, notes, and rumors that kick off a session.

entries.result: A letter arrives from the future warning of tonight’s betrayal.
A sealed package bears the party crest but no sender.
A dream is followed by a map drawn in morning dew on the window.
A courier collapses, revealing a message addressed to the wrong heroes.
Town criers spread word of a bounty that mentions each hero by name.
A coded flyer promises power to anyone who attends a midnight auction.
A rival leaves a taunting invitation to settle matters in an abandoned mill.
An unsigned note pleads for help and includes a single scorched scale.

tables.title: Job Board
tables.description: Quick prompts for patrons and odd jobs.

entries.result: Guard a freight wagon rumored to carry cursed antiques.
Retrieve a runaway homunculus before it reaches the alchemist’s rival.
Find the source of haunting sounds inside the old bell tower.
Escort a scholar to map ruins recently unearthed by floods.
Shut down an illegal gambling den skimming from the thieves’ guild.
Deliver a wedding gift that is actually a sealed extradimensional vault.

tables.title: Ritual Mishaps
tables.description: When magic backfires, the fallout lingers.

entries.result: Uncontrolled spectral echoes replay the ritual every hour.
All flames within a mile burn cold blue until the tear is sealed.
Gravity weakens sporadically, turning debris and rivals airborne.
A trapped elemental bargains for release and names its captor.
Anyone speaking a spell’s name loses their voice for a minute.
A rival ritualist hijacks the energies to empower their own scheme.
Summoned creatures cannot be dismissed and seek new allegiances.
The veil thins; whispers from beyond suggest an unexpected patron.

tables.title: Unexpected Allies
tables.description: Allies arrive—but they have agendas of their own.

entries.result: A disgraced knight offers aid in exchange for restoring their honor.
An informant from a rival faction trades intel for safe passage.
A reformed cultist shares rituals that can undo their old order.
A spirit bound to a relic agrees to help if the relic is freed.
A clever street gang will assist for control of one neighborhood.
A monster hunter joins the party—until their quarry is slain.
A diplomatic envoy steps in but demands the party owe a favor.
A rival adventuring party offers truce to face a greater threat.
